section.title: incidents creating new priorities for Incident Severity
section.para: To create a new Incident Severity, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Incident Severity, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Severity (e.g., High, Medium, Low, etc.).
Specify the order in which the Severity should appear when using the drop-down list on the Incident screen.
Enter a brief description of the Incident Severity.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Incident Severity, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Incident Severity and adds it to the master list of Incident Severities.
